short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the statistical significance of A/B tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AB Test Calculator is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help Product Managers easily evaluate A/B test results. With this plugin, users can effortlessly understand the statistical interpretation behind the numbers, enabling them to identify the best user experience and performance.
